website_summaries.verdict: A totally vegan, hydrating serum from a well-loved makeup brand that feels as light as water.
pros: Contains hyaluronic acid to increase skin's firmness and moisture
Also combines vitamin B-5 and marine extracts that boost skin's suppleness
Many customers see an increase in moisture within 12 hours
cons: Texture is too watery for some

customer_reviews.title: Not pure anymore
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed. I’ve ordered this for a few years and the formula seems to have changed, or they started mixing it with another oil. One of the ways to tell rosehip seed oil is pure, is the dark amber color and smell. The oil I’ve ordere from Kate before has always been dark amber. Got my new oil and opened it today and it has almost zero color. Ugh! Have to find a new brand now! I attached pictures showing the color difference of the old oil vs new. Left is new oil, right is old
customer_reviews.author: heatherlovess

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this oil at least 3 times before with no issue, but my most recent order (received 8/18) was awful. The oil was obviously diluted, smelled VERY OFF and broke my skin out horribly (just did a test patch)! I use Rosehip Oil because I’m pregnant and want to keep my skincare natural and safe. That’s obviously not going to be possible with this seller. Who knows what kind of filler oil they’re using!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this product for about a month ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about a month before reviewing it, and I am pleasantly surprised. I’ve had pesky stretch marks and scars that I’ve tried getting rid of for years, and I noticed how much they had faded just from using this! Will definitely buy more when I run out. Bought again and excited to continue using! Bit upset that it went up in price
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Mature Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for approximately a month, and I'm very happy with the results. It absorbs into my skin and my skin is soft and supple, not oily. I definitely have noticed a fading of dark spots and a more even skin tone in general.. I will continue to use this, as my skin is very sensitive and it loves this oil! As an update, I have reordered this oil as I absolutely love it. I have noticed such a difference in my overall skin tone since using this oil. My skin looks radiant!
customer_reviews.author: Laryn

customer_reviews.title: not 100% sold on it
customer_reviews.text: i recieved this the other day so I haven't used it on my skin long enough to give a review about how my skin reacts with it. I noticed a difference in the color of the oil. it is not as orange as radha beauty oil so I'm not really sure what that means in terms of the quality of the oil. however, it does smell the same as radha. the consistency is a little thinner than radha and doesn't leave my face feeling as oily. I'll update the review after I use it a while and see howmy skin likes it.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Best Rose Hip Oil Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best Rose Hip Oil Ever I tired the 1 once bottle and now getting the 4 ounce bottle , absolutely astounding results with upper lip wrinkles are almost gone on the right side and over wrinkles are diminished dramatically. I’m 66 .
customer_reviews.author: Mega Deeds

customer_reviews.title: Fishy smell !!
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today.I haven’t even given it time to see if it works because of the nasty smell!!it smells like a fish pond!!i don’t know what all the other rave reviews are for but this stuff smelled super nasty!! Returning it tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: cory80

customer_reviews.title: Smells like fish oil 🤢
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if rosehip oil is supposed to smell like fish, but this bottle does and i can’t use it. It does take off my makeup perfectly, which is what I bought it for. It’s going in the trash though. Fairly certain it’s rancid.
customer_reviews.author: KRM

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to like this product but for some reason it caused my skin to break out real bad. I'm a person that has always had clear skin through my life and I am not normally sensitive to different products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleared eye lid issue !
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond pleased with this product. I have been dealing with a red, itchy area in the vicinity of one eye. I carefully applied rosehip oil by Kate Blanc and, to my surprise and delight, the area has cleared up! I have been dealing with this issue off and on for 1 year. Been to eye doctor several times to no avail. I was prescribed a medicinal cream which did not do a thing. Beyond pleased with Kate's Rosehip OIl !
customer_reviews.author: Bambi

customer_reviews.title: Caused painful acne!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have what's considered sensitive skin, but using this rosehip seed oil gave me really bad breakouts. I've never had painful pimples/acne but now I have really bad ones on my chin and my forehead and they're huge. It's giving me pimples everywhere I use it, even near my eye bags which has never happened to me before. I've already emailed them about it, but customer service didn't exactly respond to my email.
customer_reviews.author: Ying

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out like never before.
customer_reviews.text: Made my skin break out like never before and ‘the ordinary’ argon oil which is heavier didn’t even make me break out like this did. I’ve gone a few months without breakouts and then I get this and boom, my face freaked out. Maybe it’s just MY skin but I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: hOnEsT-review

customer_reviews.title: Not for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, these just don't work for me. i bought the Jojoba and the Rosehip seed oil and I apply daily and my skin is just dull, dry, and uneven now. I've never really had issues with acne or dullness. I was hoping I could find a natural moisturizer but am pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Best Face Oil
customer_reviews.text: I discovered rosehip seed oil after doing much research online. Before that I used coconut oil. I have tried a few different brands but this one gets my vote. I like the 'better than average' dropper, it is not mixed with other oils and its organic. It has a nutty, earthy smell and is not scented. I recently read that it has a shelf life of 6 months so I bought 1 ounce instead of 4. My 4 ounce bottle lasted a year...
customer_reviews.author: Lori7

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no consistency!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product for the 3rd time and am very disappointed. The first bottle I bought worked great, it was the signature golden amber color and smelled like rosehip oil. Bottle # 2 was a distinctly different color and did not have the signature rosehip smell but I used it anyway. This last bottle I just recieved was almost clear and smelled rancid. I am disappointed that there is absolutely no consistency in this product. Also it may not actually be organic according to other posters!
customer_reviews.author: M.Mason

customer_reviews.title: Rosehip Oil...Ehh
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for months to reduce wrinkles on my forehead. I massage the oil into my skin every night. I have only seen minimal results. Keep in mind I am very adamant about not wrinkling my forehead. I've literally re-trained my facial expressions as preventive maintenance to minimize the wrinkles. This product is a process that's only effective when applied liberally and consistently over long extended periods. This oil did however quickly lighten the natural darker shades of color under my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Culver

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle, I loved the first one so once I ran out I bought a second. The bottle I recieved had a different smell to it which threw me off. Then I noticed the dropper was totally different. When I shook it, it got bubbly which the first bottle didn’t do. I put it on my face before I inspected it, and my face is now burning and bright red. The first bottle was great, I don’t know what the deal is with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this rosehip seed oil
customer_reviews.text: The first time around I ordered the smaller bottle because it was my first time trying Rosehip Seed oil. I loved it; my skin was so soft! So the next time I ordered, I decided to get the large bottle since I liked it so much. The second bottle was nothing like the first :( It was watery and very light in color, compared to the golden color of my first bottle. The second bottle also smelled terrible and doesn't seem to be doing anything for my skin. I'm SO disappointed! Loved the product at first...what a huge let down.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: miracle oil!
customer_reviews.text: this oil was sent from heaven, I promise! As far as helping fade scars and control acne and the like, it's helped a lot! I actually burned myself pretty bad in my leg a few weeks ago, and it really wasn't looking nice for about a week after. After it healed up a bit though (new layer of scarred skin and all, you get it), I put this rosehip oil over it every morning and night and my skin looks almost how it was originally now! As for my face: I have oily skin and was apprehensive about putting /more/ oil on my face, but on the contrary, my face has never been more soft and healthy looking and feeling!
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Different consistency in second bottle purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews, however felt the need this time. I originally bought a bottle of this product and loved it. The color was deep yellow and the consistency was thick. After using that whole bottle and truly seeing a difference in my skin, I bought another bottle. When receiving the second bottle, the dropper was shaped differently and the color was light yellow, in addition to the consistency being too liquid”y”. Disappointed In this bottle and not sure if I will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: decent experience, but probably won't re-purchase due to lack of consistency
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately, my experience with this oil was fine and it made my skin soft and supple. I did not experience any breakouts, but I rarely do to begin with. I will say it took a little while for me to feel like the oil was doing anything and I'm sad to see I'm down to my last few drops. However, reading others experiencing inconsistently, I definitely don't feel comfortable repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Kae

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been eyeing rosehip oil for a while, so after having the worst breakout of my adult life and dry skin because of the cold winter weather I finally ordered this after going through tons of reviews. When I first opened it I was disappointed in finding damaged packaging, but it seems like only the box was beat up - the product inside was perfectly intact. It has a nice golden color and the consistency isn’t too watery. After using it for a week I can honestly say my skin has never looked better. I’ve already recommended it to two other friends. I love this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Product is watered down, not the same!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this oil awhile ago and it did wonders for my skin so I ordered my second bottle and it was not even close to the first bottle of product. My first bottle was a dark amber color and had a light nutty scent. This second bottle is practically clear with no scent at all almost like its watered down. The oil does not feel the same going on nor was it as effective. I plan on returning it and getting oil from a different brand but I'm super bummed because the first bottle of oil was amazing! Such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What is this mystery oil?
customer_reviews.text: This is my third order of this exact item and this time the oil is a completely different color than it usually. It’s very light colored and smells fishy. Somethings up. Returning and not ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for skincare
customer_reviews.text: I really love Rosehip seed oil for my daily skincare routine. It’s really light weight and moisturizing, but it doesn’t clog your pores or cause irritation. The natural smell is very very slight and can smell a bit woody, or sometimes the faintest fishy smell. But it’s so so subtle, I don’t even notice it and am not bothered by it. I also use this on the ends of my hair for deep moisturizing treatments a couple times a month. Overall, I highly recommend this product; but, if you’re wanting an artificially fragranced oil, then this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t go by my review I’m allergic to a lot of face products.
customer_reviews.text: I reacted to this with cupping. Can this be credited? Or returned. I have more sensitive skin than I realized. Coconut oil doesn’t do this. The next day I was sun burnt rash like and swollen. I am very sensitive and haven’t tried rose hip oil before. Is there anything I can do with this only used once, it is a great product I’m just allergic I think.
customer_reviews.author: C. Watters

customer_reviews.title: Incredible oil
customer_reviews.text: I have skin like parchment paper, and it's even worse in the winter. I put four drops of this oil in my palm after all the serums and regular moisturizer have had a chance to settle in, and dab this oil all over my face. It gives a beautiful glow to my skin, lasts all night, and in the morning, I wake up with skin that looks like I'm in my 30's again, instead of my actual 67. It seals in everything good that you've already put on your skin. It's like icing on the cake. I can't speak to how this would be for oily skin. But for us dry gals, it's a fantastic comfortable relief.
customer_reviews.author: TurtleGirl

customer_reviews.title: I feel like the oil has also helped my eyebrows and lashes ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver to moisturize for winter and help reduce redness and inflammation from acne. It's the final step of my nighttime skincare regimen. I feel like the oil has also helped my eyebrows and lashes be fuller. The smell is light and not floral (it's the hips and not petals) and the consistency is perfect - not too thick or thin. I have recommended this to many friends and they all love it, too. I wish it came in a pump rather than the squeeze vial.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the skin on my face. Had never tried rosehip seed oil before and I am glad I did. I decided to try it on my hair’s dry ends and dry scalp. My hair looks super healthy now and I’ve only been using it for a week. I highly recommend adding this to your moisturizer and conditioner and applying before going to bed, it works wonders overnight. I will come back in two months to update my review and let you all know how big of a difference it made to use this every night.
customer_reviews.author: Prix

customer_reviews.title: Broke me out
customer_reviews.text: For the first few days when I tried it, I started breaking out and I thought it was due to stress. But I decided the stop using the oil since it was a new routine and right always my acne started going away. I thought it was also stress but once I started using it again, the acne came back......
customer_reviews.author: Wendyy H.

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This Rose Hips oil is the BEST facial moisturizer I have ever used...It hydrates your skin better than any cream (I’ve tried them all) and gives your face a smooth, even texture...I also use it on my neck and chest and my skin looks great!...I recommend this product 100%!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Greco

customer_reviews.title: ... across kate blanc rosehip seed oil and it had great reviews so I decided to give it a try ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new moisturizer when I came across kate blanc rosehip seed oil and it had great reviews so I decided to give it a try and I’m glad that I did! I noticed a difference in my skin right away. My skin feels soft and silky. I recommended it to my friends and they said they noticed a difference right away as well. My husband tried it and loved it too! I just ordered two more bottles! If you’re looking for a natural organic moisturizer I highly recommend Kate Blanc rosehip seed oil.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: My very sensitive skin seems Moore to rise and has not reacted
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin that reacts to multiple chemicals. I have a really hard time finding a good moisturizers because of my diagnosed chemical allergies. I read about this oil and decided to give it a try. I have had zero reactions to it and my skin does seem to be moisturized. I'm glad that the manufacturer included in the the packaging a description of what this product is supposed to smell like because otherwise I would have thought it had gone bad. The smell is not extremely strong but it is there. I would recommend mixing it with a another oil or lotion that has a light sent to try to help with that. Seems to be working
customer_reviews.author: Karen W

customer_reviews.title: I've run through a gamut of products and this is my favorite by far!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give this rave enough reviews! I've tried so many things, serums that run from $10 to over $100, from Target to Nordstrom and nothing has worked as well as this. It seems oily but absorbs into your skin quite well. You only need to use a little so the bottle will last much longer than most serums that require 3 or 4 drops with every use. I was leery to use it everyday because my skin usually breaks out if it's too oily but I haven't had a problem so far. I highly recommend this to anyone who suffers from hyperpigmentation or even dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny D

customer_reviews.title: great product for mature skin
customer_reviews.text: This is the third brand of rosehip seed oil I have tried, and this one is by far the best. Not sure whether my previous purchases had been on the shelf too long or just inferior, but they had a musty spoiled smell that was very unpleasant. This one, by Kate Blanc, is nearly odorless and it's a great nighttime oil to replenish my aging skin. You only need a few drops on face and neck, so although it's been months since my last purchase, I am finally repurchasing. And even after all this time, there is no rancid smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: Connecticut Bookie

customer_reviews.title: So much better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: So much better than I thought. I started “cupping” my face using this oil and it has REALLY improved my skin. I love to try natural remedies for self care and this is by far the best thing I’ve ever tried. I’m very susceptible to just overall crappy skin and I get pimples all the time, yet when I started using this rosehip oil, 90% of my ance just stopped. I use this stuff twice a day and a French clay mask a few times a week and I’m just so happy about it. So yeah, definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ally T.

customer_reviews.title: My skin is GLOWING!
customer_reviews.text: I am usually hesitant to buy skin products for my face that I haven't heard much about, but I read through the reviews on this product and they weren't wrong! After the first try, I immediately noticed that my skin was smoother, radiant and more nourished! I was highly impressed with just one use. I have combo to oily skin, so I only use it once a week (right now since it is summer time), but I much rather prefer this product for moisturization as opposed to my daily facial moisturizer. The dropper is also great and dispenses as needed. A little goes a long way! I will definitely be buying this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. It has really helped with settling my rosacea on my face also it has tremendously helped with the cracking of my skin on my hands from my Eczema. It has also helped with my breakouts I don't have as many. it's got a light scent not too strong and it is very lightweight absorbs quickly and doesn't leave my face feeling greasy I absolutely love this and I will be buying it again. I keep mine in the refrigerator
customer_reviews.author: bkemah

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT ALREADY!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! Seriously, BUY IT!! I use it to moisturize my face, just a couple drops at first but now I slather that stuff on! It absorbs really nicely, makes my skin super soft and glowy and it heals any blemishes CRAZY fast! I also noticed that I needed to scrub my skin more often and read later that it helps remove dead skin. Anyway, I just ordered another bottle in a bigger size. Buy it. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Banner

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I'm recently off an acne prescription medication, and this has made a world of difference in helping to smooth my skin and lessen acne scarring. Also, it was a life saver while on the medication, the medicine made my skin dryer than the Sahara Desert. Only this hydrated my skin enough and not once did I experience what other Accutane users experienced such as cracking or flaking. Great for scarring reduction, skin is soft and supple, and at least in my experience - non irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Josette

customer_reviews.title: received a defective bottle
customer_reviews.text: I believe the product I received to be counterfeit. The smell, texture and consistency were not the same as previous Kate Blanc Rosehip Seed Oil bottles I've received. The label was blurry and the text did not look right. I posted a previous review to this effect, but Amazon refused to post it, even though I don't think I violated the community guidelines. I've purchased multiple bottles in the past with no problem, but Amazon fulfilled this order and are still using commingled storage for products, which means it is possible that the product I received could be a knock-off.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive to buy this on Amazon because did not want to end up with the fake. But I did my research and this one was approved. It’s been doing wonders for my skin! My skin was looking dull, uneven, and tired but when I put on a few drops at night I wake up with smoother and brighter skin! The scent is strong right when you put it on but disappears quickly so it didn’t bother me too much. The dispenser is great and 2 drops goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Vit E Smell
customer_reviews.text: Well, I LOVE the Floracopecia brand, but they changed the blend (probably for the better) but also made it that I had to sign in and password this and that so I did a quick Amazon order of a new product. I can tell the difference in quality for sure. This has a strong Vit E smell and that is fine and all, but I am not trusting the 100% pure rosehip seed oil. But it goes on nicely, just doesn't seem like it's the right oil.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight oil, doesn't smell that great but seems to work ok.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good product, the top nub of the dropper is starting to twist up to one side but otherwise no complaints. Granted this is the only rosehip seed oil I've tried. I really just use it on my lips so keep it in the fridge to prolong shelf life. Doesn't smell that great, wouldn't want it getting on my sheets or furniture. I use it when am sitting up, and as it's such a thin oil before laying down I spread some burts bees vanilla bean which is a more moisturizing line, sunflower seed oil, shea, etc.
customer_reviews.author: E. C. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Rancid! Don't buy this brand!
customer_reviews.text: Their description mentions sometimes having a fishy smell. UNDERSTATEMENT!! I've smelled dead fish...this is 10x worse and the smell doesn't go away! Even my dogs who roll in deer poop snubbed their noses at me. I will never buy this oil from Kate Blanc again. This Rosehip seed oil was light yellow (another indication of a bad oil as it should be dark orange and woody smelling). Lure was much better.
customer_reviews.author: Brad S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It's great my oily skin. I just use three drops on my face at night, and on the ends of my hair. It has improved my pores. And paired with tamanu oil, visibly decreased my dark spots from acne.
customer_reviews.author: SarahG_EndersGaimen

customer_reviews.title: An absolute skin saver! 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Improved my oily and acne prone skin just after 2 applications! I had a really bad breakout after having an allergic reaction to the make p:rem blue cap sun fluid, and there were about a dozen pimples and whiteheads on my chin. I was using the COSRX centella blemish cream to treat it but it wasn't doing anything. But this rose hip oil is a godsend! I mixed it in with my moisturizer at night, and the pimples went down after two nights! I'm gonna use it until they're completely clear, but I'm very hopeful that it will soon! There is a reason that this product already has 5/5 stars reviews, and I can attest to it!
customer_reviews.author: Patric H.

customer_reviews.title: Mother Nature Always Wins
customer_reviews.text: This is a delicate, dry oil, that can be applied neat on most skin types. For very sensitive skin, dilute with a light carrier oil and spot test. The oil is medium-light brown in color, lightweight, and the fragrance is what fresh cold-pressed seed should smell like (no hint of rancidity). Rose hips oil nourishes from the inside-out, beyond the dermis, to smooth, fade and add suppleness. Sinks into skin fast! No oil transfer on clothing. It's Unisex!!! Works wonders on overworked hands, dermatitis, liver spots, and helps speed minor wound healing. The more I use it, the more uses I find!
customer_reviews.author: Pesky

customer_reviews.title: Not the real deal...
customer_reviews.text: I have used Rosehip Seed Oil for the last two years as my nightly moisturizer, I have combo skin and suffer from acne, and have loved what it does to my skin, but this is not it! This Rosehip Oil is extremely clear/pale and not the bright yellow like advertised or what is what your skin needs and wants! The last oil I used was discontinued so I went with this one but I was really disappointed when I opened the bottle and saw it was not yellow at all! The oil should be a bright yellow, so I am disappointed in my purchase and this products advertisement...
customer_reviews.author: Grump12

customer_reviews.title: Good for fading aging spots
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I use Rosehip seed oil and I love it! I applied it on my face in the morning and before bed time. I combined it with vitamin E oil. It looks oily but after a whole night sleep, the oil disappeared! I guess my skin absorbed it. I had only used it for about 2 weeks and I found the spots on my face faded a little bit. I will keep using it. Maybe it will clear all the spots!
customer_reviews.author: TicTacTao

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for its size
customer_reviews.text: I'm not gonna front I am sure it says the size of the container but I don't read lol. I usually mix oils with my lotion because I was raised correctly. This thing lasted me about two weeks with almost daily use. It does not smell like rosehip oil that you get at TJ Maxx for like $4.99 this is definitely more organic or whatever so it smells like dirt. I am not going to buy this again, but it was my fault. I didn't notice anything special happening to my skin but I have good genetics so I doubt it was going to help me much.
customer_reviews.author: Christina H.

customer_reviews.title: The glow on my face.
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with eczema on my face February last year The medicine the dermatologist ordered took a long to clean my face up and also made it dry. I found a spa their products work but quite expensive. I checked for a more natural product and came across this rosehip seed oil and mixed it with vit e oil and I saw much improvement on my face after 4 days it's now 6 weeks later and my friends are complementing me on the way my face looks. The scars from the eczema are also disappearing after 6 weeks. I'm now going to purchase a second bottle because I shared the last one with my mother.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: 2 bottles ordered, 2nd bottle was old
customer_reviews.text: Ive ordered this oil twice now. I have sensitive, very dry skin. The first time I ordered this, I loved it. The second time the quality just didnt seem as high as the first time. Slightly thicker, slightly yellower than the first bottle. Had a different dropper style in the second bottle (which I didn't love). It works fine, and I havent had any issues other than just not loving the second bottle as much as the first. Might have just gotten an older bottle the second time? Will probably try out a different brand next time though; I prefer consistent quality in products and didnt see that.
customer_reviews.author: April Renfro

customer_reviews.title: my makeup goes on like butter, my skin has a healthy glow and ...
customer_reviews.text: With the summer to fall weather changes, my face was so dry! A friend told me about Rosehip Oil. After some research, I fond Kate Blanc's products on Amazon. I ordered the Rosehip and the Jojoba Oil and have been applying a few drops (per the instructions) to my face each morning and night. It has been about a week, but what a difference! My face is smooth, my makeup goes on like butter, my skin has a healthy glow and the fine lines around my eyes and lips are hardly visible. I think I may add Tea-tree oil to my regimen and will definitely use Kate Blanc's products. They are a great quality and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Best Rosehip oil!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried i dont know how many brands, this is just the best. the oil is thick (but still light), colored a deep yellow and earthy smelling, which is how it should be! it's yellow enough it actually stains fabrics - which is why i usually apply this at night, in my pjs and away from the world :) but i also pre-mix with a cream moisturizer for day time, i prefer it over the cream alone. i never break out anymore, my skin always glows. literally i hope kate blanc never stops producing this oil because I'm sold for life, it's my life saver for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: happywifey

customer_reviews.title: Love this product, and now I love my skin and my hair a little bit more :)
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! I used to spend so much money on lotions and heavy creams at the department store, then I found rosehip oil. I like this one in particular because it's light but effective, pleasant smell, ORGANIC and nicely priced. The company also sent me an email that explains how to use the product on my hair, skin and nails and recipes on how to mix it with other products if I wanted to. Great customer service. Small, caring company. I'll be buying this product again, and again, and again!
customer_reviews.author: ARLady

customer_reviews.title: Weird, Rotten Smell Before Expiration Date
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oil last year and it was supposed to expire on 12/31/2019. However, towards the middle of this year, I noticed that its smell changed completely. It started smelling like old-warehoused clothes. I still had more than half of the bottle left, because I only used a few drops daily, so I basically wasted my money. I recommend getting this in a smaller size so the oil does not go bad and get wasted.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: 2nd  Bottle Not Good
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle i received I would give it a 5 Star hands down, the smell was perfect and i could actually see a change in my skin quickly. The customer service was great, they contacted me to check how i liked the product and services... I ordered a second bottle and the smell was not consistent, neither was the oil. It did not work the same and the bottle ended up just taking up space in the medicine cabinet. Sadly I have not ordered again...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it (UPDATED)
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle of this I bought was wonderful and lasted a long time. This one is less than six months old and already smells like it's going bad. I'll be going with a different brand after this and reading other reviews. Original Review: This makes my skin so soft and has helped to reduce lines. Great to mix with high quality essential oils for even better results.
customer_reviews.author: WistfulDreamer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, nor the worst.
customer_reviews.text: It's oil, but this is not 100% organic. The color is very light and this feels thinner than previous oils I've used. Better can be found for just a couple extra dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if authentic??? Purchase at your on risk..
customer_reviews.text: I received the product and immediately questioned it because it was light orange in color and have tried other brands that were a deeper orange and with authentic brands it shouldn’t like that..I am very knowledgeable about these products with rosehip..haven’t seen any results with this product..
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Ramos

customer_reviews.title: This really has helped my skin moisture levels!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good...I purchased this to help balance my moisture/oil levels in my skin. I have very oily skin and I received information that when using this oil as part of your skincare routine, it helps by keeping your skin from being dehydrated and overproducing oils. I have been using this oil for a few days now having incorporated it into my nighttime skincare routine. I must say that when I wake up in the morning, my skin does not feel oily but rather plump and hydrated. It has a natural organic smell to it that I find not overpowering. I will continue to use this as part of my skincare routine and am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: I like the product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, and I like that the company follows up with how to use. They seem to be concerned about customer service and customer satisfaction. I am using as a facial moisturizer and on my hands/cuticles to help with winter dryness, and, so far, the results are good.
customer_reviews.author: LJLW

customer_reviews.title: Caused me to breakout!
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing. Has a odd smell and yellow strong color. It doesn’t do anything other than make me break out and injabeny had a fave break out in 15yrs! Contacted the seller but got no respond, very unprofessional. Save your money and don’t buy this product
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders! Skin is brighter, lines are softer, and moisturizing without being heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic oil and works wonders on sensitive skin! I use this during the day under my sunscreen and my skin loves it! It’s definitely made a very positive difference in both how my skin looks and feels. My skin is brighter and softer and the lines are less noticeable and my skin is moisturized without feeling oily. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: BEST oil for the face and neck!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! I do my own dermaplaning so i wanted a top of the line oil to leave on my face after the treatments. I now use this EVERY day, that’s how much i love it!!! I like putting it on as a primer oil even tho i have a traditional primer oil. I have combo type skin but on the areas i have sensitivity i use this. I’ve been using it on my husband with cystic acne pitted scars and his skin is improving too. His scars will never go away but they are slowly minimizing.
customer_reviews.author: Cherries27

customer_reviews.title: Fine product but....
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine but I got an overwhelming amount of emails from this company before & after I got this product saying “the dropper was in another part of the package” which it wasn’t. Begging me to leave reviews we’re talking 7 emails. Bro Katie chill the F out. I won’t be buying again just because of the annoying emails.
customer_reviews.author: Bun

customer_reviews.title: My new go-to!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing the Rosehip Seed Oil by Kate Blanc. I initially bought this product after reading that Rosehip seed could help with acne and scarring (I’ve tried many things throughout the years to help with my occasional acne breakouts.) This is now a trusted go-to in my facial skincare routine and isn’t harsh or drying like some acne solutions. There is virtually no scent but I would say it’s reminiscent of olive oil. I use this on its own before bed and occasionally in the daytime, under sunscreen and makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had extremely dry skin on my face that would peel. I tried 3 different moisturizers before I considered using an oil. Coconut oil is too thick and greasy. This rosehip oil has changed my skin like nothing else. I’m told my Skin looks healthy now. It’s not greasy, my skin absorbs the oil really well, and it lasts all day. I’ve bought 3 more bottles for friends and relatives. Highly recommend this oil to anyone with normal to dry skin. The value in this little bottle is remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel gomez

customer_reviews.title: Smells like fish oil
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to switch over to this new brand of rose hip oil but upon opening the bottle dabbing on my face, I smelled fish scent - smells exactly like omega fish oil, terrible scent on my face. I tried emailing customer service but got no response. Can't return the product either so it's a bummer. I guess I'm going back to my old rose hip oil, should have stuck with one that works instead of trying something new.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha O.

customer_reviews.title: Might be what I need. Seems more lighter/diluted compared to other tried brand
customer_reviews.text: This seems diluted, very faint fishy scent which disappears, not too concerning. Compared to ordinary, seems quite diluted ( might be a good thing, as too rich may not always be best for acne--ordinary brand is a concentrated one and rich in color and texture). Will update review after more usage
customer_reviews.author: Bunmi

customer_reviews.title: I was absolutely amazed by this product
customer_reviews.text: I was absolutely amazed by this product! The shipping was super fast! When I opened the beautifully packaged product I happily discovered that this particular Rosehip Seed Oil was far superior than the other Rose Hip Oil I had previously purchased. It was a golden color, thick with the richness of Rosehip Seed oil, that I didn't feel or see in my other product. I will definitely repurchase this again. I will feature it on my You Tube Channel, LeadMeToPeace Jeanie in the near future. Thank you for such a wonderful product!! I am amazed!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie C

customer_reviews.title: Light yellow with odd smell not nutty more like cooking oils
customer_reviews.text: Received this bottle few days back and tried once. Oil is not orange color as many mentioned but clear light yellow and smells like cooking oil not pleasant. Not sure if it’s authentic? Can the vendor explain?
customer_reviews.author: om

customer_reviews.title: Sister's birthday present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sisters birthday. She's been looking into keeping her skinn looking younger and she was totally in love with this product. She said she doesn't use it everyday. But I even noticed her acne scars looked less visible
customer_reviews.author: Jamon88

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a few months now and I can definitely see a difference. My skin is not as dry or flaky during the winter months. The smell isn’t the best but I would prefer not to have an added fragrance since I’m applying this to my face for skin care concerns. I have been recommending this product to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Smells weird but is moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I like this or not. I absolutely hate the smell. Some of the reviews described a fishy smell...mine was more of a musty smell and I started putting a scented moisturizer on over it just to get rid of the smell on my face. I think it’s helped lock in moisture but I also mix it with some vitamin C serum too. I don’t think I’ll buy it again because of the smell but it didn’t do anything bad at least.
customer_reviews.author: Thuperduper

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite product!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this on my face for a few weeks. I love it. I’m in my 40’s, I have combination skin, and am starting to get wrinkles. I started using this at night, and really like the feel of it on my skin. Smells good, too. My skin just feels moisturized, not greasy. After awhile, I began using it in the morning instead of moisturizer. It helps my makeup glide on, like a primer. I have overdone it a couple times, but then you just look dewey. My skin looks really clear and fresh and vibrant.. better then it’s looked in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best remedy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using rosehip seed oil for years to treat facial scars and sensitive skin that breaks out randomly. I mix it with Vitamin E oil, tea tree oil, lavender oil, and argan oil. I use a jade facial roller which I also purchased on Amazon to get it deep in my skin which works so well!
customer_reviews.author: Puff

customer_reviews.title: It smells like FISH OIL!!
customer_reviews.text: So...it smells awful. Period. Nothing else to say. The cats even look at me funny when I had it on.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Brunet

customer_reviews.title: ACNE PRONE SKIN SAVIOR
customer_reviews.text: Although my acne hasn't vanished completely, my skin is doing soooo much better. Less red, more moisturized, and plump and firm. I mix this into my moisturizer. Highly recommend for softer and more even skin! My acne breakouts are not as big (but still come around my period), and my skin tone has evened out a bit. Have been using daily for about 2 months to see significant results.
customer_reviews.author: Dancer Denise

customer_reviews.title: ☹️ Not a good look.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had it long enough to give a real review. Just wanted to give a heads up on not getting it into your eyes. I have eczema around my eyes and wanted to see if it would get rid of it. But I must of rubbed my eyes, cause my eyes swelled up. ☹️ Not a good look.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great Experience
customer_reviews.text: This review is more about the customer service I received as I haven't really used the product long enough to notice a real difference in my skin. I will say that I like that the oil is lightweight and doesn't make my skin greasy which is great since I like to apply it before bed. When i ordered the product though I got an email from the company that included tips and advice on how best to use the product. Excited to see the results :)
customer_reviews.author: Kierra

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: First time user for rosehip oil. It's wonderful!! Goes on smoothly and absorbs quickly. My skin loves it! Update - I ordered and received my second bottle and will always have in my daily regimen! The best!!
customer_reviews.author: Pbill

customer_reviews.title: Best rosehip seed oil
customer_reviews.text: A must have for skincare. I started using rosehip seed oil for moisturizer a few years ago and have never stopped. Let’s just clarify: oil doesn’t always equate to oily skin, especially with super absorbent oils like this. After about an hour my skin just feels soft, not oily. I’ve tried several brands and this one seems to be the best. The oil seems thicker (not watered down) and to absorb into the skin better.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this oil for a couple months now and I love it! There is a definite difference, especially on my chest and neck. My skin looks more hydrated and actually feels softer. There has been a visible reduction in the fine lines as well. I apply this oil and allow it to soak in for a few minutes then put my regular body and face lotions on over it. I also like that this is a cruelty free product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Not as pleased with 2nd buy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this a 2nd time and product was much different.. 1st product nice, thick, dark in color, and could smell seed like scent very nice, mixed well with my night cream... 2nd product was runny and light in color, not as much scent at all mixed with night cream was too light and little more greasy ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little bit nit goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a few times. I am getting a BBL therapy on my face this week i was told this is a great product not medicated like other products. I will start using more and update my review. I use it as often as i can nightly little bit goes a long way. I haven’t been taking it long.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Remedy
customer_reviews.text: This mix with VitaminE and Jojoba Oil does wonders for the skin. I mix these three each morning for a moisturizer. It has been clearing up my skin so well. I don't have troublesome skin but tend to have a few pimple scars. A great oil to invest in for skin purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Taylordtravels

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I am pregnant and I am avoiding getting dry skin. This oil is amazing at keeping my skin moisturized. I have very sensitive skin and I’m prone to seasonal eczema so far this has been gentle on my skin. Im not fond of smell but I do love organic products I just put a little bit of coconut oil over it and the rosehip oil scent does not bother me after that.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd read the other reviews before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I completely agree with the other reviewers saying this oil has been diluted. I ordered it at the beginning of March but only just opened it today, and I was shocked to say the least. Instead of being bright orange like all the other brands of rosehip seed oil I've used, this oil is basically clear and very watery in constancy. It also had a slightly fishy smell to it, which worried me. I highly recommend buying a different brand of rosehip seed oil as this one is undeniably diluted.
customer_reviews.author: Jayjaythejetplane

customer_reviews.title: Fishy Smell
customer_reviews.text: The oil works better than the one I was previously buying however the "scent" smells like a fish bowl or lettuce that is starting to spoil. I was not looking for a return and tried to find out if it was that batch that had a problem before I ordered again. The message I received back was not a personal one but an automated one addressing the ""light nutty scent" of their product. I wanted to work with them and was not looking for a return but when your customer service is automated, there is not much that you can do.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Monko

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing and calming
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a few weeks to give an honest opinion. It is moisturizing, calming for sensitive skin, and faintly scented. It doesn't smell good or bad. It just is. I use it on my face and neck. My sister uses for her stretch marks.
customer_reviews.author: A. Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Good product, scam-y main picture
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it on my dry face along side moisturizer, and it works great. I get some pilling when using it with other acids and products so I recommend really letting anything else you use dry first. My only gripe with this product is the picture the company uses on amazon to sell the product. They use the 4oz bottle on the 1oz bottle section and photoshop the 1oz on the label. Flip between the 4oz and 1oz section, they literally use the same picture minus one photoshopped difference. That seems like purposefully bad practice that they could get in trouble for.
customer_reviews.author: Inga Kammueller

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: loved this product and finished the bottle within 3 months (1 oz) i decided to switch to another brand to get more bang for my buck and that was a mistake. the difference was astonishing, this rosehip oil is amazing and cleared up my scars in the matter of weeks and kept my face beautifully moisturized and kept my natural oils at bay with constant use. did not stain any of my pillows either. i highly recommend splurging on the 4 oz bottle!!
customer_reviews.author: Nydia

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It took me a minute to warm up to the idea of using an oil on my face, but rosehip oil is a dry oil, so you don't get that greasy feel you would with other essential oils. This product has changed my skin. It helps with breakouts due to dry skin, and is great for minimizing fine lines. I also work some into my scalp, as it's supposed to be very nutritious for your hair. Love, love, love this oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought the Rosehip Seed Oil by Kate Blanc. After I read the reviews I was a bit wary but glad I took the chance. There was NO smell or offensive odor to this product. It feels good on my skin, like any oil, and I have not had a negative reaction. I'm also happy to say that I received a nice email from the company inquiring about how I liked the product and offering suggestions on how I can use it. Overall, positive vibes! One happy customer. I'll be back for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Just got my rosehip seed oil today & it’s the real deal. Dark amber in color, with a mild, nutty scent. Rosehip seed oil my preferred oil because it absorbs so easily into my skin, and this is one of the best quality oils I’ve purchased. The ingredients list specifically says “rosehip seed oil” so I’m not sure why other buyers are saying it’s rosehip oil & not rosehip Seed oil. I have a bottle of just rosehip oil that I purchased from a health food store & it differs greatly in smell/color with this Kate Blanc one, so I’m pretty sure this is rosehip seed oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly well !
customer_reviews.text: No matter how dried out or sore my skin feels from winter air, this stuff helps. Doesn't smell great, but I only care how it works. I can't live without this now. Usually put it on at night before bed. Will use it during the day if air is cold and windy. Definitely mitigates red irritated skin, and I have really sensitive skin. Highly recommended !
customer_reviews.author: CynykGal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been so self conscious about the dark circles around my eyes and I started using this oil on my face twice a day! The proof is in the pictures!! I’ll never buy another product from any stores!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I’ve used rosehip oil in the past and have had good results, but this particular oil has worked faster and better than any I’ve ever used before. It’s high quality, and the seller sent an email after it had shipped with helpful instructions and skin care recipes. Speaking of shipping, I ordered the oil on a Monday morning and received it by Tuesday afternoon. Highly recommend for improving acne, acne scars, reducing the appearance of pores, balancing oil production and helping to create an overall glowey complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Rosehip Seed Oil by Kate Blanc. USDA Certified Organic, 100% Pure, Cold Pressed, Unrefined. Reduce Acne Scars. Essential Oil for Face, Nails, Hair, Skin. Therapeutic AAA+ Grade. (1 fl oz)
feature_bullets: USDA CERTIFIED ORGANIC ROSEHIP ESSENTIAL OIL - Kate Blanc's Organic Rosehip Seed Oil is certified by USDA and is guaranteed to be authentic, pure, natural, and hexane free. Unrefined Organic Rosehip Seed Oil can have a slight fishy smell and this is normal. If you are unhappy with the smell, you can ask for a full refund. 100% Guaranteed Authentic or FULL REFUND.

SMOOTHER SKIN & LESS ACNE SCARS: Coldpressed organic rose hip oil's unique anti-inflammatory properties reduce stretch marks, acne marks, fine lines and scars. It also help with dermatitis, acne and eczema. It works as a natural anti-aging solution by tightening the skin and keeps your face, lips, and body hydrated and supple. It's also a great facial toner and has beautiful fragrance.

ANTI-AGING SOLUTION: Rose hip oil is rich in omega-3, omega-6, and fatty acids. These vitamins gives your skin a youthful appearance by accelerating the skin's cellular activity and slow down your aging process. It also adds shine and body to colored hair, permed hair, or hair that has been damaged by too much sun or cold weather. Virgin and unrefined rosehip seed oil makes great skin massage oil and beauty products and face cream. It's a great facial oil that goes well under makeup.

REMOVE DANDRUFF: Cold pressed mosqueta rose hip oil is also great for hair and nails. Rose hip oil can reduce dandruff's flaking and itching. Kate Blanc's Rosehip Seed Essential Oil is Certified Organic and is paraben free and cruelty free. It is a great beauty oil and can also be used as a moisturizing cream, hair growth serum, and natural scar removal.

100% GUARANTEE AND ONE YEAR WARRANTY - We aim to offer the highest quality and most authentic products. We guarantee your satisfaction. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, please return it for a FULL REFUND within 365 days. Add to Cart.
